thread.title: Crystal Palace and Middlesbrough eye Oliver Burke transfer with £13m teenager short of games at RB Leipzig
thread.title_full: Crystal Palace and Middlesbrough eye Oliver Burke transfer with £13m teenager short of games at RB Leipzig

author: Neil Moxley
title: Crystal Palace and Middlesbrough eye Oliver Burke transfer with £13m teenager short of games at RB Leipzig
text:
Sport Crystal Palace and Middlesbrough eye Oliver Burke transfer with £13m teenager short of games at RB Leipzig Scotland winger bought from Nottingham Forest in the summer has started only once for the German club PLUS: Frustrated Gaston Ramirez wants a move Share Youngster Burke could be back in England on loan soon (Photo: Bongarts/Getty)   Thank you for subscribing!   
Middlesbrough and Crystal Palace want to bring Oliver Burke back to English football until the end of the season. 
Scotland international Burke joined Germany's RB Leipzig in the summer in a £13million move from Nottingham Forest – despite links with a number of clubs in the Premier League. 
But the 19-year-old winger has been restricted to just one start so far this season for the Bundesliga title contenders, making most of his appearances from the bench. 
Now, Burke’s representatives are understood to have touched base with a number of sides to inform them a deal could be a possibility as he as he needs to play. Boro may soon have a vacancy for an attacking midfielder with Ramirez unsettled (Photo: Getty) 
Middlesbrough’s quest for a new attacking midfielder could grow in the coming weeks, with the news Gaston Ramirez has told the club he wants to leave. 
The Uruguayan arrived in the summer on a free transfer from Southampton after starring for the Teessiders on loan in last season's Championship promotion campaign, but he is unhappy at being played out of position. 
Sunday Mirror Sport understands Leicester and Bournemouth have already shown an interest in taking the 26-year-old — should boss Aitor Karanka make him available. Like us on Facebook
